string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational corporation
Manali is a resort town nestled in the mountains of the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh near the northern end of the Kullu Valley in the Beas River Valley.
Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment.
The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New Yorks secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.
Harry Potter is a series of fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling.
Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company
Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products
The Indian Navy is the naval branch of the Indian Armed Forces.
